response.answer_text: Why 95%? Why not 100%? Scoring good marks in class 10 is really very easy. Even 2 hours daily study is enough if you are attending your classes daily and paying attention in the class. Maths: Go through NCERT 2-3 times. Practice last year question papers as well as Evergreen sample papers. If you have more time, you can practice R.D. Sharma too!! But Ncert and sample papers are enough to score a perfect 100. Science: Again NCERT is the key.. Chemical equations are only from Ncert. so u need not to mug up all the reactions. The ones available in ncert are enough.. again last year question papers must be practised. Studying sample papers of different publications is waste of time.. if u dont have enough time Social science: History and geography from NCERT and economics and civics from candid. Questions always repeats ..so it is good to learn last year questions… English: Just practice writing part as much as u can… go through the text.. and dont forget to read whole drama portion as it can fetch u very good marks. Hindi: I would suggest All in one . it is a complete package and can help u a lot to understand the type of questions. Hope it helps.. Ask if u have any other query…ALL THE BEST FOR YOUR EXAMS…

You should practise last 5 year question paper of ssc board some time QUESTION has been repetited .Do not take language subject as lightly because they are scoring. Join and give test series of any more experience coaching institute.give proper time management to you.Take help of your seniors.practise more of maths and Hots problem are very important so SOLVE all hots problem and do not take lightly. Writing is more important in ssc exam so try to SOLVE paper with good handwriting.for more take help from teacher and board moderators.
why don’t you try for 100% ? study daily for 4 hours because you have less time if you want to get your desired result you have to study minimum 4 hours for a day

More than studying it is understanding that matters. when you read a subject with a full grasp and understanding with all doubts fully answered you will not bother about marks or ranks. they just come on their own. So please don’t bother about marks, but study with as clear understanding and appreciation of the subject.
